headline: 3CLogic Revolutionizes Voice-Enabled Customer Service with ServiceNow
summary: 3CLogic, the leading AI-powered contact center platform purpose-built for ServiceNow, the AI platform for business transformation, today announced a new partnership that will leverage 3CLogic's robust Communication Platform as a Service (CPaaS), and Contact Center as a Service (CCaaS) infrastructure to complement ServiceNow's AI Experience, specifically AI Voice Agents. The partnership will enhance customer service outcomes for global enterprises by seamlessly connecting voice-enabled front-offi

headline: Is ServiceNow’s 22% Drop a Buying Opportunity After Notable Industry Partnerships?
summary: Wondering if ServiceNow is a bargain or overpriced in today's market? You are not alone, as its valuation has become a hot topic among investors eyeing the tech sector. After a strong multi-year climb, ServiceNow's stock has pulled back with a 22.2% drop over the past year and a 22.0% decline year-to-date. This marks a distinct shift in momentum. Recent headlines have spotlighted ServiceNow's continued leadership in workflow automation and notable partnerships with major industry players...
